name: GeStream
tag_list: robot, controller, software, app, servo, motor, sensor, robotic, education, course, camp, university, primary, college
overview:
GESTREAM Technology, Inc. has developed many innovative robotic technologies and robotic educational products since it was founded 2005.

Our product team members provide excellent designs in mechanism, electron, electric-machinery, optoelectron, interactive sensors, communication, internet. Innovation and commitment to quality have allowed GESTREAM to produce cutting-edge, high-performance products that offer the best value in the ROBOT market at the most competitive price:

  1. Humanoid robot: BeRobot sets Guinness World Records
  2. Robot Key components design: Controller, Software, APP, PCB, Servo, Motor, Sensor.
  3. Robotic Course and competitions.
  4. Surveillance robot interaction via 3G phone, WiFi, internet.
  5. Industrial robot: Customized design for auto manufacturing.
